name: Brain Power (aGoldenFly)
description:
Use Your Brain!

This is a proof of concept regarding a game idea I had, which is a short and quick game where you traverse a dungeon using your brain power to defeat the evil within!

How to Play

The game consists of levels that change every time you play, where you must find and defeat the red boss in order to access the next level. After three levels, the game ends. When you are near a block, press the Set button to set a block's potential movement. Then, you can press the Release button to release the stored potential in the block.

Controls

Left Mouse Button / Q - Set

Right Mouse Button / E - Release

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move

Escape - Menu
